messages.title: A local champion fighting for us
messages.content: Local Councillor Lewis Bartoli is standing in the General Election to deliver real change for Monkseaton. For over 20 years our area has been represented by the same Labour MP but in that time our services have failed and while our MP has failed to stand up for our area. Lewis offers a different choice, with a clear five point plan to improve our area: from more police in our area to more investment in our roads and local NHS.
